title: Using the connector
description: You want to know how to use the connector in Salesforce Commerce Cloud? We're here to help you.

first-steps.title: Your first steps with the connector
first-steps.description: You are very new with Akeneo connector for SFCC and you don't know where to begin. Here are a few articles to help you understand the basics. Enjoy!

find-data.title: Where to find my PIM data?
find-data.description: Do you need a hand to find your PIM data that you have synchronized in SFCC? Follow the guide!
